sentences.en: He is a mite taller than I.
He is taller than his brother.
He is, if anything, a little taller than I.
sentences.cn: 要说呢, 只是他比我高一点罢了.

sentences.en: He was compact, probably no taller than me.
sentences.cn: 他矮小壮实，可能并不比我高。

sentences.en: His brother is taller than him [ he ].

sentences.cn: 我要是个子高一些就好了。

sentences.en: Like you, a bit, but smarter, taller and better looking.
sentences.cn: 就像你，有一点点，但是更聪明、更高、更好看。

sentences.en: Metropolitan buildings become taller than ever.
sentences.cn: 大城市的建筑变得比以前更高.

sentences.en: She has grown so that she is even a little taller than her mother.
sentences.cn: 她长得比母亲都高一点了.

sentences.en: She is taller than I imagined, more adult, more intense.
sentences.cn: 她比我想象的更高、更成熟、更热切。

sentences.en: She was taller than he was and stooped slightly.
sentences.cn: 她比他高，而且略微有些驼背。

sentences.en: Taller plants interrupt the views from the house.
sentences.cn: 稍高些的植物遮挡了房内的视线。

sentences.en: The boy grows taller year by year.
sentences.cn: 这男孩一年一年地长高了.

sentences.en: The third gorilla was taller by a head.
sentences.cn: 第三只大猩猩要高出一头。

sentences.en: Tom is taller than everyone else in his class.
sentences.cn: 汤姆比班上其他的人都高.

sentences.en: When re-released in January 2010, she will be taller and thinner, but still wearing an outfit similar to her first one.
sentences.cn: 当在2010年1月重新发布的时候，她会变得更高和更瘦，但仍然会穿着和第一次相似的服饰。

trans.tran_cn: 高的( tall的比较级 )，难以置信的，难以完成的，（用以表示或询问高度）有…高
